description:
Kasumi isn’t amused at the stakes involved in the game that Hanako and Olivia are playing. Her well-meant intention to make the game more wholesome backfires.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Battle That Must Be Won / Puppets / Betting My Life
Défaite interdite / Marionnette / Au péril de sa vie
Zettai ni Makerarenai Tatakai / Ayatsuri Ningyou / Inochigake
絶対に負けられない戦い / 操り人形 / 命懸け
